price: Твој Господар зна оно што крију њихове груди и оно што они обзнањују.
arabic: وَرَبُّكَ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تُكِنُّ صُدُورُهُمۡ وَمَا يُعۡلِنُونَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: warabbuka yaʿlamu mā tukinnu ṣudūruhum wamā yuʿ'linūna
